abstract: Bragster, a London-based site “for dares and social bets,” announced Wednesday that it had secured $3.5 million in Series A venture cash. The funding round was led by none other than Intel Capital, Intel’s investment branch.
lead_paragraph: Bragster, a London-based site “for dares and social bets,” announced Wednesday that it had secured $3.5 million in Series A venture cash. The funding round was led by none other than Intel Capital, Intel’s investment branch.
